sn48.55:1.1: “Of all kinds of fragrant heartwood, red sandalwood is said to be the best.
sn48.55:1.2: In the same way, the faculty of wisdom is said to be the best of the qualities that lead to awakening in terms of becoming awakened.
sn48.55:1.3: And what are the qualities that lead to awakening?
sn48.55:1.8: and wisdom are qualities that lead to awakening, in that they lead to becoming awakened.
sn48.55:1.9: Of all kinds of fragrant heartwood, red sandalwood is said to be the best.
sn48.55:1.10: In the same way, the faculty of wisdom is said to be the best of the qualities that lead to awakening in terms of becoming awakened.”
